name: K32 Super Rocket
description:
A sidescrolling spaceshooter

update: rev1 wasnt working correctly and last levels were being skipped, fixed in rev2

update: rev3 is now out, fixed unplayable level

features:

- 8 levels

- awesome ost and graphics

- 100% assembly

- only 32kb (basically fits in any cartridge)

- full color support and dmg compatible

- health bar and fuel bar(making this part of the ui was very hard but im very proud of the outcome)

- open source :D

Source Code:https://github.com/jona32u4hm/K32

Made by a single developer.

Special thanks to:

- T0FUU26 for help with two of the tracks.

- The awesome GBDev Community.

- The devolopers of RGBDS, the assembler I used

- The organizers and hosts of the GBCompo21.

btw the name is k32 because its a 32kb game XD
